author: Express Web Desk
title: Uttar Pradesh elections 2017 LIVE updates: Small traders destroyed, farmers have no money, says Rahul Gandhi | The Indian Express

organizations.name: indian express online media pvt ltd

text:
Uttar Pradesh elections 2017 LIVE updates: Small traders destroyed, farmers have no money, says Rahul Gandhi Uttar Pradesh elections 2017 LIVE updates: Small traders destroyed, farmers have no money, says Rahul Gandhi UP polls 2017 LIVE updates: Get the latest from Congress vice-president Rahul Gandhi's rally in Rae Bareli and Allahabad here. By: Express Web Desk | New Delhi | Updated: February 21, 2017 3:44 pm UP elections LIVE updates: Congress vice-president Rahul Gandhi will address a rally in Rae Bareli as well as a roadshow in Allahabad this afternoon. (PTI File Photo) 
Ahead of the fourth phase of the Uttar Pradesh elections on February 23, Congress vice-president Rahul Gandhi will address a public meeting in Rae Bareli at the Pakharauli Gram Panchayat grounds in Dalmau. Following his meeting, Rahul will join Samajwadi Party chief and Uttar Pradesh CM Akhilesh Yadav for a roadshow in Allahabad, starting at the Gandhi family’s heritage Anand Bhawan home and ending at Shaukat Ali Road. 
To counter the Congress-Samajwadi Party campaign, BJP president Amit Shah will hold a parallel road show in the city on Tuesday. Shah’s roadshow will happen on a route between Allahpur to Ghantaghar. 
LIVE UPDATES – Congress rally in Rae Bareli, Allahabad: 
2.42 pm: A bike rally was taken out in Jahanabad constituency by the Congress and SP’s party workers. 
WATCH VIDEO | PM Modi Promises Development For Bundelkhand, Says ‘SCAM stands for SP, Congress, Akhilesh and Mayawati ’ 
2.13pm: 
1.55 pm: पूरा इलाहाबाद है ‘राहुल-अखिलेश’ के साथ और सब कह रहे हैं, जे हुई न बात भैया, जे हुई न बात! #संगम_किनारे_राहुल_अखिलेश @WithCongress @nsui @IYC pic.twitter.com/NAerW9dilg 
— UP Congress (@UPCC_Official) February 21, 2017 
1.35 pm: Congress supporters gather ahead of the road show. Congress supporters ahead of the Congress-SP road show in Allahabad City (Express Photo) 
1.32 pm: इलाहाबाद में ‘राहुल-अखिलेश जी’ के संयुक्त रोड शो के लिए अति उत्साहित है जनता. #संगम_किनारे_राहुल_अखिलेश @INCIndia @WithCongress @OfficeOfRG pic.twitter.com/Vixz8JUfXP 
— UP Congress (@UPCC_Official) February 21, 2017 12.30 pm: 
— With Congress (@WithCongress) February 21, 2017 
12.20 pm : If the prime minister wants to act out, he can take it out on me. Why is he punishing the people of Rae Rae Bareli and Amethi, asks Rahul Gandhi. ‘प्रधानमन्त्रीजी को बदले ले लिए जो करना है मेरे साथ करें,लेकिन रायबरेली और अमेठी के लोगों को चोट क्यूँ पहुँचा रहे हैं?’ रायबरेली pic.twitter.com/EqmjhRiBLX 
— Office of RG (@OfficeOfRG) February 21, 2017 
12.03 pm : Bete(Modi) ne Maa (Varanasi) se bahut waade kiye the par ek bhi wada pura nahi kiya, says Rahul Gandhi, referring to Modi’s speech in Varanasi post the 2014 Lok Sabha elections. 
11. 57 am: Hindustan ka PM, Raebareli aur Amethi ke logon ko takleef kyun pahuncha raha hai? (why is the Prime Minister of India creating trouble for those who live in Rae Bareli and Amethi?) Rahul asks. He added that the BJP government and PM Modi have not fulfilled even a single promise out of the ones made in Banaras. 
11.55 am: In his speech, Rahul now targets Vijay Mallya. Says Prime Minister Narendra Modi came to his rescue and waived of the Rs 12 lakh crore that he owes to banks. 
11.50 am: Rahul Gandhi has begun addressing a rally in Rae Bareli. “Farmers have no money, small traders are destroyed. Prime Minister Narendra Modi has finished them, ask them they’ll tell you the same,” he says. 
11:40 am: The support for Narendra Modi at the ground level among BJP workers is still intact. However, BJP leaders are not sure if it will translate into votes. Liz Mathew writes on how party workers are disappointed not everyone shares their enthusiasm. 
11.20 am : Amit Shah addresses public meeting ahead of his parallel road show with Rahul. 
11.10 am : Rahul arrives at the Children’s National Institute at Swaraj Bhavan. Rahul Gandhi interacts with kids at the Children’s National Institute at Swaraj Bhavan (Express Photo) 
Watch video:PM Modi Promises Development For Bundelkhand, Says ‘SCAM stands for SP, Congress, Akhilesh and Mayawati’ 
The fourth phase of voting in the Uttar Pradesh assembly election will take place on February 23, and the Congress Party’s family bastion of Rae Bareli will go to polls. © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
